intro.title: Backend Engineer: Building Scalable & Reliable Backend Systems
intro.body: Building backend magic for 8+ years! I leverage my Java, Spring Boot, and Cloud Native expertise to craft efficient microservices and APIs. Proven leader passionate about fostering collaborative, high-performing teams. Fluent in English, Japanese, Mandarin, and Cantonese for seamless communication across borders.

list.label: Experienced Java & Kotlin developer (8+ & 3+ yrs) with expertise in Spring Framework (Boot, Cloud) and a strong grasp of OOP & functional programming for efficient solutions.

Skilled in both relational and NoSQL databases, ensuring data consistency through transactions and locking mechanisms. Leverage message queues / Kafka to facilitate decoupled communication within microservice architectures.
Leverage Docker for containerized application development, manage large-scale deployments with Kubernetes, and automate infrastructure with Ansible for efficient, scalable, and repeatable solutions.

list.title: Rakuten Group, Inc., Japan | Software Engineer | March 2021 - Present

projects.title: Cloud-Native Migration with Kubernetes:
projects.challenge: Modernized a critical application by migrating it from a VM environment to a Kubernetes-based CaaS platform.
projects.role: Led the evaluation, planning, and execution of the migration process.
projects.impact: Achieved cost optimization, improved scalability, and resource utilization, while aligning infrastructure with best practices. Additionally, significantly reduced End-of-Life (EOL) operational costs.

projects.title: Secure Database Migration (MySQL to MariaDB):
projects.challenge: Migrated a critical database from MySQL 5.7 to MariaDB, prioritizing security and minimal downtime.
projects.role: Orchestrated the planning and execution, selecting the optimal migration strategy to ensure data integrity and seamless transition.
projects.impact: Maintained high availability and data security during the migration, minimizing user impact.

projects.title: Real-Time API Data Consistency (Point Redemption):
projects.challenge: Addressed data inconsistency issues within the real-time point redemption API.
projects.role: Led the architectural design and implementation of a solution to address data consistency issues within the real-time point redemption API
projects.solution: Designed and implemented pessimistic locking to prevent race conditions.
projects.impact: Significantly improved user experience by ensuring data consistency during point redemptions, leading to a noticeable decrease in customer support tickets related to point redemption issues.

projects.title: Mentorship and Knowledge Sharing (Log Management System):
projects.challenge: Coached a junior team member on the evaluation and migration of the log management system from ELK Stack to Datadog.
projects.role: Provided guidance on Datadog's functionalities and best practices, fostering knowledge sharing and understanding of modern log management solutions.
projects.impact: Empowered junior team member to effectively evaluate and migrate the log management system.
